items.content: I like javaScript and everything web
items.content1: I am always energetic and eager to learn new skills and I use a creative approach to problem solve so I’m always coming up with innovative ideas. I am a dependable person who is great at time management also I have experience working as part of a team and individually. I am flexible in my working hours, being able to work evenings and weekends because I love my work. I am motivated to go to the yoga and gym to get fit, healthy and relax, I'm interested in painting and photography so I’m always painting my spare time.

items.w: Work at arcbes as web designer
I’ve Done my thesis at Tarbiat Modares University , It subject was “E-Learning personalization
items.w1: Based on  learner's cognitive style and prior knowledge” . I designed a website for a questionnaire(8thclass.ir) –turn on vpn

items.w: I've gotten PHP and Laravel Training Certificate from Tehran Faculty of Engineering for 40 hours.
Laravel Programming language as a backend developer in Sanjeman company for 3 months.
Participant in 6th international conference on e-learning and e-teaching
Theory of Languages Teaching Assistant 2015: C/C++ programming Teaching Assistant
ACM referee in Shahroud University of Technology
Participant in ACM competition of Sharif university of Technology as a coach
Active member in Student Computer Science Society
Student work at computer lab of Shahroud University of Technology
Ideologist and analyst in Startup Weekend Sharif university of Technology: Ranked sevent
